DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening may help doctor find prostate cancer sooner , may easier treat . PURPOSE : This research study look whether patient screened prostate cancer previously screen .
DOC.brief_title: Frequency Prostate-Specific Antigen Screening African American Men San Francisco Area
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine degree patient screen prostate cancer previously screen . OUTLINE : Participants complete question survey prior prostate-specific antigen blood test do purpose screen prostate cancer ask pastor , church , heard SELECT study determine degree African-American men church-going population previously screen .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets follow criterion : AfricanAmerican male Age 35 year old Attends church regular basis Resides San Francisco area PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
